        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1058</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Olympic Winner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Olympischer Sieger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gagnant Olympique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vencedor Olympic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vincitore Olimpico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ολυμπιακός νικητής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ganador Olímpico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learners are going to participate in a trivia game and learn about the modern Olympic Games.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trivia game</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">modern Olympic Games.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anfänger werden an einem trivia Spiel 
teilnehmen und über die modernen olympischen Spiele erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants vont participer à un jeu de trivia
et se renseigner sur les jeux olympiques modernes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners estão indo participar em um jogo do 
trivia e aprender sobre os jogos olympic modernos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti stanno andando partecipare ad un 
gioco di trivia ed imparare circa i giochi olimpici moderni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι πρόκειται να συμμετέχουν σε ένα παιχνίδι 
trivia και να μάθουν για τους σύγχρονους ολυμπιακούς αγώνες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes van a participar en un juego del
trivia y a aprender sobre los juegos olímpicos modernos.</string>
          </description>
